body_html:
hi
There was no problem when input size was 48 * 48, but when it was 96 * 48, there was problem like the following figure

Do you know why this is happening?

It's the transformer I used.(https://github.com/oarriaga/STN.keras/blob/master/src/models/layers.py)

body:
hi 
There was no problem when input size was 48 * 48, but when it was 96 * 48, there was problem like the following figure

Do you know why this is happening?


It's the transformer I used.(https://github.com/oarriaga/STN.keras/blob/master/src/models/layers.py)



![p](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8243705/48749280-8cccb480-ecbd-11e8-847e-c529a3e0ba64.JPG)
